domain.name: Athlete
domain.description: An athlete in the world, like Serena Williams or Lionel Messi

text:
@De11eDonne All players should have had option to opt out w league base pay or opt in for full salary. Should not have needed any medical exemptions, review board etc. It should never have been set up this way. 

Chronic Lyme is controversial. Covid19 is controversial. Too much room for bias
